effect.text: You may swap a card from your hand with one of your faceup cards in the Storyline.
effect.locText: Puedes intercambiar 1 carta de tu mano con 1 de tus cartas boca arriba de la Trama.

effect.text: You may gain 1 Attack token. You may discard 1 card from your hand to the bottom of your deck to gain another Attack token.
effect.locText: Puedes obtener una ficha de Ataque. Puedes descartar 1 carta de tu mano a la parte inferior de tu mazo para obtener un Ataque adicional.

effect.text: You may place 1 Action token from the pool on a Thanos or Power-Up card.
effect.locText: Puedes colocar 1 ficha de Acción de la reserva en una carta de Thanos o de PowerUp.

effect.text: If you have 1 or 2 cards in hand, you may draw 1 card
effect.locText: Si tienes 1 ó 2 cartas en tu mano, puedes robar una carta.

effect.text: You may KO another Hero in this Location to immediately clear a Threat card.
effect.locText: Puedes dejar fuera de combate a otro Héroe en este Lugar para eliminar 1 carta de Amenaza inmediatamente.

effect.text: You may discard 1 Action token to draw 1 card.
effect.locText: Puedes descartar 1 ficha de Acción para robar 1 carta.

effect.text: You may gain 1 Wild token for each other Hero in this Location
effect.locText: Puedes recibir una ficha de Comodín por cada Héroe adicional en este Lugar.

effect.text: You may move to any other Location.
effect.locText: Puedes moverte a cualquier otro Lugar.

effect.text: You may discard 1 card from your hand to the bottom of your deck to gain 2 Attack tokens.
effect.locText: Puedes descartar 1 carta a la parte inferior de tu mazo para obtener 2 fichas de Ataque.

effect.text: You may swap the position of any 2 Hero cards of your choice in the Storyline.
effect.locText: Puedes intercambiar la posición de 2 cartas de Héroe de la Trama.

effect.text: You may move Thanos to this Location.
effect.locText: Puedes mover a Thanos a este Lugar.

effect.text: You may draw cards until you have 3 in your hand
effect.locText: Puedes robar cartas hasta que tengas 3 en tu mano.

bio.text: Despite his name, Black Dwarf is a massive alien and brutal follower of Thanos and his  Black Order, and he'll do whatever it takes to accomplish his master's evil goals. Helping him to that end, Black Dwarf possesses impenetrable skin, and superhuman strength, durability and stamina, making him a feared battle opponent. To match his awesome size, Black Dwarf wields massive bladed and blunt force weapons.
bio.locText: A pesar de su nombre, Black Dwarf es un alienígena masivo y un seguidor brutal de Thanos y su Orden Negra, y hará lo que sea necesario para lograr los malvados objetivos de su maestro. Ayudándolo con ese fin, Black Dwarf posee una piel impenetrable y una fuerza, durabilidad y resistencia sobrehumanas, lo que lo convierte en un temido oponente de batalla. Para igualar su impresionante tamaño, Black Dwarf empuña armas de fuerza contundente y de hoja masiva.

description.text: Deal 1 damage to each Hero in Black Dwarf's and adjacent Locations.
Deal 1 damage to each Hero in Black Dwarf's and adjacent Locations.
Black Dwarf heals up to 3 Health (up to his starting value), if he is at full Health, deal 1 damage to each Hero in his Location instead.
Black Dwarf heals up to 3 Health (up to his starting value), if he is at full Health, deal 1 damage to each Hero in his Location instead.
As long as at least one Super Tough is in play, Black Dwarf ignores 1 damage each turn.
As long as at least one Super Tough is in play, Black Dwarf ignores 1 damage each turn.
As long as at least one Chain Hammer is in play, Black Dwarf's BAM! also deals 1 damage to each Hero in adjacent Locations.
As long as at least one Chain Hammer is in play, Black Dwarf's BAM! also deals 1 damage to each Hero in adjacent Locations.
Location effect. Deal 1 damage to each Hero in this Location.
Location effect. Deal 1 damage to each Hero in this Location.

specialRules.text: When a Hero is KO'd, Black Dwarf doesn't activate his BAM! Instead, he plays another Master Plan card.

overflow.text: If 1 or more CIVILIAN/THUG tokens can't be added to a Location, deal 1 damage to each Hero in that Location.

bam.text: Deal 1 damage to each Hero in Black Dwarf's Location.

bio.text: As a prominent member of the Black Order, Ebony Maw can be found in the devoted service of Thanos, his adoptive father. Rather than physical strength. Maw is gifted with a genius-level intellect and the abilities of telepathy, telekinesis, mind control and flight. He often uses his intellect and persuasive voice to masterfully manipulate and control even the strongest minds, leading to being described as 'a black tongue that spreads mischief and evil wherever he goes'. But his allegiances prove fickle, as he turns on Thanos in favor of Thanos' offspring, Thane .. ultimately turning him too.
bio.locText: Como miembro destacado de la Orden Negra, Ebony Maw se puede encontrar al servicio devoto de Thanos, su padre adoptivo. Más que fuerza física. Maw está dotado de un intelecto de nivel de genio y las habilidades de telepatía, telequinesis, control mental y vuelo. A menudo usa su intelecto y su voz persuasiva para manipular y controlar magistralmente incluso las mentes más fuertes, lo que lleva a ser descrito como 'una lengua negra que esparce travesuras y maldad dondequiera que va'. Pero sus lealtades demuestran ser ficticias, ya que se vuelve contra Thanos a favor de la descendencia de Thanos, Thane .. en última instancia, convirtiéndolo a él también.

description.text: Each Hero in Ebony Maw's Location takes 1 Crisis token.
Each Hero in Ebony Maw's Location takes 1 Crisis token.
Immediately play a number of additional Master Plan cards equal to the total number of Crisis tokens the Heroes have.
Immediately play a number of additional Master Plan cards equal to the total number of Crisis tokens the Heroes have.
LOCATION. Each Hero in this Location takes 1 Crisis token. If there are no Heroes here, play another Master Plan card after resolving the current one.
LOCATION. Each Hero in this Location takes 1 Crisis token. If there are no Heroes here, play another Master Plan card after resolving the current one.
LOCATION. Deal 1 damage to each Hero in this and adjacent Locations.
LOCATION. Deal 1 damage to each Hero in this and adjacent Locations.
Heroes starting their turn in this Location do not get actions from the previous Hero card in the Storyline.
Heroes starting their turn in this Location do not get actions from the previous Hero card in the Storyline.

specialRules.text: Heroes with any Crisis tokens must play their Hero card randomly on their turn. Then, they discard 1 Crisis token.

overflow.text: If 1 or more CIVILIAN/THUG tokens can't be added to a Location, each Hero in that Location gets 1 Crisis token.

bam.text: Deal 1 damage and give 1 Crisis token to each Hero in Ebony Maw's Location.

bio.text: A member of a world Thanos destroyed, Proxima Midnight was taken by Thanos and raised as his own daughter. Considered one of the fiercest warriors in the universe, Proxima Midnight travels the world with her deadly spear - forged by Thanos himself and marked by its tip of a star trapped in a quantum singularity - making her one of Thanos' most feared allies. But her strengths aren't limited to her spear, which never misses and kills anyone it pierces. She also possesses superhuman strength, speed and endurance.
bio.locText: Un miembro de un mundo que Thanos destruyó, Proxima Midnight fue tomado por Thanos y criado como su propia hija. Considerada una de las guerreras más feroces del universo, Proxima Midnight viaja por el mundo con su lanza mortal, forjada por el propio Thanos y marcada por la punta de una estrella atrapada en una singularidad cuántica, convirtiéndola en uno de los aliados más temidos de Thanos. Pero sus puntos fuertes no se limitan a su lanza, que nunca falla y mata a quien atraviesa. Ella también posee fuerza, velocidad y resistencia sobrehumanas.

description.text: Discard all CIVILIAN in Proxima Midnight's Location and increase her Track by the number of CIVILIAN discarded. Heroes in her Location may take 1 damage for each CIVILIAN they want to keep in that Location.

Discard all CIVILIAN in Proxima Midnight's Location and increase her Track by the number of CIVILIAN discarded. Heroes in her Location may take 1 damage for each CIVILIAN they want to keep in that Location.

Discard all CIVILIAN in both adjacent Locations and increase the Slaughter Track by the number of CIVILIAN discarded. Heroes in these Locations may take 1 damage for each CIVILIAN they want to keep in their Location.

Discard all CIVILIAN in both adjacent Locations and increase the Slaughter Track by the number of CIVILIAN discarded. Heroes in these Locations may take 1 damage for each CIVILIAN they want to keep in their Location.
Each CIVILIAN in this Location requires 1 extra Heroic to be rescued.
Each CIVILIAN in this Location requires 1 extra Heroic to be rescued.
While in this Location, Proxima Midnight ignores the first ATTACK used against her each turn.
While in this Location, Proxima Midnight ignores the first ATTACK used against her each turn.
Heroes in this Location suffer I extra damage whenever they take damage.
Heroes in this Location suffer I extra damage whenever they take damage.

overflow.text: If 1 or more THUG tokens can't be added to a Location, deal 1 damage to each Hero in Proxima Midnight's Location.  If a CIVILIAN token can't be added to a Location, increase the Slaughter Track by 1 for each CIVILIAN token you couldn't add.

bam.text: Deal 1 damage to each Hero in Proxima Midnight's Location. Discard all CIVILIAN from her Location and increase the Slaughter Track by 1 plus the number of CIVILIAN discarded.

plot.text: Slaughter Track - When this track reaches 12, Heroes lose.

bio.text: Perhaps the most feared being in the cosmos, the mad titan Thanos is a nihilist of the highest order. His sole ambition is to return the universe to what he believes is its natural state - oblivion. Growing in power and infamy as he traverses the stars, Thanos regularly causes wanton destruction and leaves a devastating swath of chaos in his wake, often seeking out terrifying sources of cosmic power, like the legendary Infinity Stones, in an effort to see all of existence tremble in his shadow.
bio.locText: Quizás el ser más temido del cosmos, el titán loco Thanos es un nihilista de primer orden. Su única ambición es devolver el universo a lo que él cree que es su estado natural: el olvido. Creciendo en poder e infamia a medida que atraviesa las estrellas, Thanos regularmente causa destrucción desenfrenada y deja una devastadora franja de caos a su paso, a menudo buscando fuentes aterradoras de poder cósmico, como las legendarias Infinity Stones, en un esfuerzo por ver toda la existencia. temblar en su sombra.

description.text: Discard 1 CIVILIAN from Thano's Location and from both adjacent Locations.
Discard 1 CIVILIAN from Thano's Location and from both adjacent Locations.
Thanos heals up to 5 Health (up to his starting value) and deals 1 damage to each Hero in his Location.
Thanos heals up to 5 Health (up to his starting value) and deals 1 damage to each Hero in his Location.

title.text: Infinity Battles: Place this card on Thanos' deck and play another Master Plan card.
title.locText: Batallas del infinito: Coloca esta carta en el mazo de Thanos y juega otra carta de Plan maestro.

description.text: From now on, Heroes must ignore 1 MOVEMENT each turn.
description.locText: Desde ahora, los Héroes deben ignorar una Acción de movimiento en cada turno.

title.text: Infinity Battles: Place this card on Thanos' deck and play another Master Plan card.
title.locText: Batallas del infinito: Coloca esta carta en el mazo de Thanos y juega otra carta de Plan maestro.

description.text: From now on, Heroes must play their Hero card randomly on their turn.
description.locText: Desde ahora, los Héroes deben jugar sus cartas aleatoriamente.

title.text: Infinity Battles: Place this card on Thanos' deck and play another Master Plan card.
title.locText: Batallas del infinito: Coloca esta carta en el mazo de Thanos y juega otra carta de Plan maestro.

description.text: Thanos gains 6 Health (may go above his starting value).
description.locText: Thanos obtiene 6 puntos de vida (pudiendo superar su valor inicial).

title.text: Infinity Battles: Place this card on Thanos' deck and play another Master Plan card.
title.locText: Batallas del infinito: Coloca esta carta en el mazo de Thanos y juega otra carta de Plan maestro.

description.text: Deal 1 damage to each Hero in the game.
description.locText: Inflige 1 punto de daño a cada Héroe en la partida.

title.text: Infinity Battles: Place this card on Thanos' deck and play another Master Plan card.
title.locText: Batallas del infinito: Coloca esta carta en el mazo de Thanos y juega otra carta de Plan maestro.

description.text: Put all already completed Mission cards back into play.
description.locText: Vuelve a poner en juego todas las cartas de las Misiones completadas.

title.text: Infinity Battles: Place this card on Thanos' deck and play another Master Plan card.
title.locText: Batallas del infinito: Coloca esta carta en el mazo de Thanos y juega otra carta de Plan maestro.

description.text: Play 2 other Master Plan cards in sequence.
description.locText: Juega 2 cartas adicionales de Plan maestro y resuelve una tras otra.

superVillainText.text: Play a standalone game, with no Infinity Stones and no Power Ups.
superVillainText.locText: Juega una partida independiente, sin Gemas del Infinito y sin Potenciadores.

specialRules.text: When a Hero is KO'd, Thanos doesn't activate his BAM! Instead, that Hero is eliminated from the game and replaced by a new Hero.

overflow.text: For each THUG token that can't be added to a Location, turn the leftmost CIVILIAN token in that Location into a THUG.  If 1 or more THUG can't be added to a Location and there are no CIVILIAN tokens there, play another Master Plan card.

bam.text: Deal 2 damage to each Hero in Thano's Location, and 1 damage to each Hero in adjacent Locations.

plot.text: The Heroes lose if the number of Heroes eliminated from the game equals the starting number of Heroes.
